function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Infection of workers in slaughterhouses","Impact":"Spread of contagious diseases, including SARS-CoV-2, among workers in the food industry","Mitigation":"Implementation of strict hygiene protocols, regular testing, and vaccination of workers","Technologies":"Advanced sequencing technologies for virus detection","People":"Workers in slaughterhouses and food markets","Owner":"Government health agencies and food industry stakeholders"},{"Description":"Detection of live virus in seafood markets","Impact":"Potential transmission of contagious diseases to consumers and workers in seafood markets","Mitigation":"Enhanced sanitation measures, regular testing, and monitoring of seafood markets","Technologies":"Advanced sequencing technologies for virus detection, environmental monitoring sensors","People":"Consumers and workers in seafood markets","Owner":"Government health agencies and seafood industry stakeholders"},{"Description":"Traces of SARS-CoV-2 RNA in sewage water samples","Impact":"Early circulation of the virus and potential risk of contamination through sewage","Mitigation":"Increased surveillance of sewage water, development of early warning systems, and public health education","Technologies":"Advanced sequencing technologies for virus detection, environmental monitoring sensors","People":"General public, public health authorities","Owner":"Government health agencies, environmental protection agencies"}]}
